Text:
even though this torrent's size is 4.36 gb. it only has last three episodes of this season, episode 20, 21, 22 and some behind the scenes. it wasn't mentioned in the description at all. 

the files are in .vob.buf etc. so i thought burning on dvd might bring the entire season episodes but no. wasted one dvd by burning these files and yet no complete season.

it took four days for this torrent to finish downloading. in the end iam extremely disappointed with this torrent. wasted one dvd, bandwidth, time, days and energy. :(
